text:
This is a great idea Saranjeet. I started adding RSECon25 issues yesterday and we can continue adding more over the next week or two.

We have a few other people coming to the R Dev Day that work on translations and may be interested to pick up these issues as well. Some of us that are there early may get together on the Monday morning to start work, so potentially people would have time to work on more than one issue! I know Anelda won't be there then, but others may be if they are not going to the Fortran event!

text:
Hi Heather,

Yes, I am aiming to add issues in the next couple of weeks. I did add some earlier but they were about stuff directly from the proposal. It would be nice to have self-contained (and if possible, independent) good first issues so that people interested could contribute.

I don't think I am doing the Fortran event so I will be around whenever you say.
